effect.shortEffect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to iron barbs.

description.diamond-pearl: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.
description.platinum: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.
description.black-white: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
description.black-2-white-2: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
description.x-y: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
description.sun-moon: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
description.sword-shield: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
